content.rendered:
Directed by Jeethu Joseph

Written by Jeethu Joseph. R. Samala

Star Venkatesh Daggubati (Rambabu). Meena (Jyothi). Nadia Moidu (Geetha Prabhakar). V.K. Naresh (Prabhakar). Tanikella Bharani (Vinay Chandra). Sampath Raj (IG Goutam Sahu). Satyam Rajesh (Sanjay). Shafi (Janardhan). Kruthika (Anju). Esther Anil (Anu). Shamna Kasim (Advocate Renuka). Annapoorna (Jyothi’s Mother). Suja Varunee (Saritha). Rajshri Nair (Doctor). Tammareddy Bharadwaja (DGP). C.V.L. Narasimha Rao (Advocate Janardhan). Chammak Chandra (Raja). Sirisha (Latha). Gautam Raju (Somaraju). Naidu Gopi (Hotel Babai). Rajendra (Thahasildar). Shashi (Forensic Surgeon). Sammeta Gandhi (Peter). Vizag Srinivas (Gautam Sahu’s Friend). Lakkimsetty Nageswara Rao (Paper Man). Namala Murthy (Milk Man). Arfaz Ayub (Forensic Assistant 1). Satish (Forensic Assistant 2). Viswa Mohan (Ramesh). Adam Ayub (Judge). Bhikshu (Sidhanthi). Prakash (Rohit)

Language Telugu

Producers D. Suresh Babu. Jacob K. Babu. Sai Krishna. Antony Perumbavoor. Rajkumar Sethupathy

Production Max Movies. Rajkumar Theaters Private Limited. Suresh Productions
